'''Taliesin's Manuscript''' is a Quest Item obtained after the player completes the hidden exploration objective [[Tell a Tale for Taliesin]] by telling [[Taliesin]] stories about [[The Chasm]] and then returning the next day. This is related to the ''[[Wonders of the World]]'' [[Achievement]] "[[The Tome of Taliesin]]".
